request.description: Register a new vendor account
Get the authenticated vendor's profile

formdata.value: A great store with amazing products

request.description:
Complete vendor onboarding with file uploads.

**Notes:**
- Logo: Single image file (max 2MB, jpg/png/webp)
- Business Images: Multiple files (max 10, 5MB each, jpg/png/webp)
- All other fields are required text fields

**Folder Structure:**
- Logos: `uploads/stores/{userId}/logo/`
- Business Images: `uploads/stores/{userId}/business-images/{date}/`

Get inventory history across all products with filters (Admin only)
Get all supplies across all vendors (Admin only)

Get supply summary and analytics (Admin only)
